posts.title: Clemson going downhill
posts.message: Man, Clemson played horribly during game against Notre Dame! I could play better and give better calls with my mouth ducktapped and my hands tied behind my back!

posts.title: Names given at birth
posts.message: I don't understand the name i was given at birth

posts.title: Coca-Cola
posts.message: I can't believe this company is still fucking running!
